mapper.update: update profile set profile_filename = #{originalImg}, profile_filepath =#{thumbNail} where user_id = (select id from user where user_id = #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT p.id , u.id AS user_id , profile_title , profile_content , profile_filename as img_original , profile_filepath as img_thumbnail , user_nickname , user_email FROM user u JOIN profile p ON u.id = p.user_id where u.id = #{id}
